## Load Catalog

```{r}
#| label: open_downloadurl
open_downloadurl <- function(x) {
  
  add_vars(x, downloadURL = delist(get_elem(
    get_elem(x$distribution, "data", DF.as.list = TRUE),
    "downloadURL"
  )))
}
```

```{r}
#| label: clean_temporal
clean_temp <- function(x) {
  slt(mtt(x, year = as_int(year)), -title, -description) |>
    roworder(-year)
}
```

```{r}
#| label: catalog_open_payments
catalog_open_payments <- \() {
  
  x <- as_tbl(
  mtt(fload("https://openpaymentsdata.cms.gov/api/1/metastore/schemas/dataset/items?show-reference-ids"), 
    modified    = as_date(modified), 
    description = replace_fixed(description, c("\n", "\r. \r.", '"'), c(". ", "", "")),
    theme       = delist(map(theme, function(x) get_elem(as.list(x), "data"))), 
    year        = delist(map(keyword, function(x) get_elem(as.list(x), "data"))), 
    year        = replace_fixed(year, c("all years"), c("All")),
    year        = cheapr_if_else(title == "Provider profile ID mapping table", "All", year),
    title       = tools::toTitleCase(title)))
  
  x <- slt(
    open_downloadurl(x),
    year,
    theme,
    title,
    description,
    modified,
    identifier,
    downloadurl = downloadURL) |>
    rsplit( ~ theme)
  
  list(
    summary_all  = roworder(sbt(x$Summary, year == "All", -year), title),
    summary_year = sbt(x$Summary, year != "All") |> 
      mtt(year = as_int(year), 
          title = stri_replace_all_regex(title, "^[0-9]{4} ", ""),
          description = NULL) |> 
      roworder(title, -year),
    general = clean_temp(x$`General Payments`),
    research = clean_temp(x$`Research Payments`),
    ownership = clean_temp(x$`Ownership Payments`)
  )
}

open <- catalog_open_payments()

open
```

### Grouped Payment Summaries

```{r}
#| label: open_payments_grouped
open_payments_grouped <- function(x) {
  
  x <- x$summary_year |> rsplit(~ title)
  
  list(
    recipient_nature_of_payment = x$`Payments Grouped by Covered Recipient and Nature of Payments`,
    recipient_reporting_entity = x$`Payments Grouped by Covered Recipient and Reporting Entities`,
    reporting_entity_nature_of_payment = x$`Payments Grouped by Reporting Entities and Nature of Payments`,
    recipient_reporting_entity_nature_of_payment = x$`Payments Grouped by Reporting Entities, Covered Recipient, and Nature of Payments`,
    recipient_state_nature_of_payment = x$`State Payment Totals Grouped by Nature of Payment for all Years`
  )
}

open_payments_grouped(open)
```

## Dictionaries

```{r}

  paste0("https://openpaymentsdata.cms.gov/api/1/datastore/query/", x, "/0")
}
```

```{r}
#| label: open_dictionary
open_dictionary <- function() {
  
  x <- map(
    get_elem(
      get_elem(
        as_tbl(
          fload(
            paste0(
              "https://openpaymentsdata.cms.gov/",
              "api/1/metastore/schemas/dataset/",
              "items?show-reference-ids"
              ))), 
        "data", 
        DF.as.list = TRUE),
      "title|describedBy",
      regex = TRUE), 
    function(x) x[not_null(names(x))]
    )
  
  x <- new_df(
    name = delist(get_elem(x, "title")),
    dictionary = delist(get_elem(x, "describedBy"))) |>
    mtt(
      year = as_int(stri_extract_all_regex(name, "[0-9]{4}")),
      name = cheapr_if_else(
        na(year),
        name,
        stri_extract_all_regex(
          name, 
          "^.*(?=\\s.\\sDetailed Dataset [0-9]{4} Reporting Year)"
          )),
      year = cheapr_if_else(
        na(year), 
        fmax(year), 
        year
        )) |>
    sbt(year == fmax(year), -year)
  
  x <- x[["dictionary"]] |> 
    map(request) |> 
    req_perform_parallel(on_error = "continue") |> 
    resps_successes() |> 
    resps_data(\(resp) resp_body_string(resp)) |> 
    fparse(query = "/data")
  
  funique(
    new_tbl(
      field = delist(
        map(
          get_elem(x, "fields"), 
          function(x) 
            get_elem(x, "name")
          )),
      description = delist(
        map(
          get_elem(x, "fields"), 
          function(x) 
            get_elem(x, "description"))
        ) |> replace_fixed(c("\n", '"'), c(" ", ""))), 
    cols = "field", 
    sort = TRUE)
}

open_dictionary() |> 
  print(n = Inf)
```
